name: Monster Putt
description:
Mini golf where you cannot see the contours of the green. Nor the obstacles. And you have to get a hole in one to pass.

  • 35 levels of hole in one mini golf. You have unlimited putts, but must score a hole in one to continue.
  • Well, you need to finish 3 out of 5 levels to unlock the next 5. I hate how getting stuck on one level blocks your progress in other games.
  • Two goals for each level: fastest and slowest putts. Pretend like you were going for slowest if you get lucky on one. I won't judge.
  • Instant retry. You'll get in this zen like rhythm of putt, watch, adjust, re-putt. Or you'll punch the screen.
  • Gold, silver and bronze medals for each level for you to achieve.
  • 5 users on the one computer.
  • Completely non-violent and not even any swearing either. Family friendly.
